english.segment1: Nothing can wash away my sin. Nothing can wash away my sin. Nothing can wash away my sin. Nothing, nothing, nothing but the blood of Jesus
english.segment2: Nothing can make the devil won. Nothing can make the devil won. Nothing can make the devil won. Nothing, nothing, nothing but the blood of Jesus
english.segment3: Nothing can bring me peace with God. Nothing can bring me peace with God. Nothing can bring me peace with God. Nothing, nothing, nothing but the blood of Jesus
english.segment4: Nothing can lead me to Your throne. Nothing can lead me to Your throne. Nothing can lead me to Your throne. Nothing, nothing, nothing but the blood of Jesus
english.segment5: Nothing can make Your people one. Nothing can make Your people one. Nothing can make Your people one. Nothing, nothing, nothing but the blood of Jesus.
